name: Roasted Chicken and Truffle Rigatoni
description: A flavorful combination of roasted chicken and truffle rigatoni.

name: Chicken Risotto
description: This dish consists of organic chicken, risotto, tomato paste, rich chicken stock, peaches, and parmesan crisps. Allergens to take note of are: chicken, dairy and cheese.

name: Pasta Alfredo & Chicken Parmigiana
description: A classic combination of Alfredo pasta and crispy Chicken Parmigiana.

name: Truffle Risotto
description: A creamy risotto with truffles, porcini stock, herbs, and spices topped with parmesan crisps and freshly shaved truffle. Allergens to take note of are: dairy and cheese.

name: Brisket Pacherri & Smoked Cheese Pasta
description: A rich, savory dish featuring brisket, Pacherri pasta, and smoked cheese.

name: Truffle Rigatoni Pasta
description: A luxurious combination of truffles and rigatoni pasta.

name: Deconstructed Pesto & Burrata Lasagna
description: A deconstructed version of lasagna with pesto and creamy burrata.
